sections.heading: corporations; powers.Any municipal corporation may contract with any person and provide funds for home-delivered meals for the elderly and senior volunteer programs

sections.text:
13-308.Municipal corporations; powers.

Any municipal corporation may contract with any person and provide funds for home-delivered meals for the elderly and senior volunteer programs.

SourceLaws 1975, LB 307, § 1;R.S.1943, (1983), § 18-1730;Laws 2017, LB417, § 1.
